AddPAS.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] 

[Vector] pos
  PAS position that players may be able to see.

AddPVS.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Adds all players that are in the same PVS as this position.

[Vector] Position
  PVS position.

AddPlayer.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Adds a player to the recipient filter

[Player] Player
  Player to add to the recipient filter.

AddRecipientsByTeam.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] 

[number] teamid
  Team index to add players from.

GetCount.description: CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Returns the number of valid players in the recipient filter.

GetPlayers.description: CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Returns a table of all valid players currently in the recipient filter.

RemovePAS.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] 

[Vector] position
  The position to test

RemovePVS.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Removes all players that can see this PVS from the recipient filter.

[Vector] pos
  Position that players may be able to see.

RemovePlayer.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] Removes the player from the recipient filter.

[Player] Player
  The player that should be in the recipient filter if you call this function.

RemoveRecipientsByTeam.description:
CRECIPIENTFILTER [Server] 

[number] teamid
  Team index to remove players from.
